<!-- components/TaskForm.vue -->
<template>
  <form @submit.prevent="$emit('submit', formData)">
    <!-- Nombre -->
    <b-form-group label="Nombre:" label-for="name-input">
      <b-form-input
        id="name-input"
        v-model="formData.name"
        required
      ></b-form-input>
    </b-form-group>

    <!-- Descripción -->
    <b-form-group label="Descripción:" label-for="description-textarea">
      <b-form-textarea
        id="description-textarea"
        v-model="formData.description"
        rows="3"
      ></b-form-textarea>
    </b-form-group>

    <!-- Estado -->
    <b-form-group label="Estado:" label-for="status-select">
      <b-form-select
        id="status-select"
        v-model="formData.status"
        :options="['low', 'medium', 'high']"
        required
      ></b-form-select>
    </b-form-group>

    <!-- Completado -->
    <b-form-group label="¿Completada?" label-cols-sm="4" label-align-sm="right">
      <b-form-checkbox
        v-model="formData.completed"
        switch
        size="lg"
      ></b-form-checkbox>
    </b-form-group>

    <!-- Fecha de expiración -->
    <b-form-group label="Fecha de Expiración:" label-for="expires-at-input">
      <b-form-input
        id="expires-at-input"
        type="datetime-local"
        v-model="formData.expires_at"
      ></b-form-input>
    </b-form-group>
  </form>
</template>

<script>
import { TaskRepositoryImpl } from "@/app/task/infrastructure/repositories/TaskRepositoryImpl";
import { StoreTaskUseCase, UpdateTaskUseCase } from "@/app/task/usecases";
import { TaskResponse } from "@/app/task/interfaces/dtos/TaskResponse";

export default {
  name: "TaskForm",

  props: {
    initialData: {
      type: Object,
      default: () => ({
        name: "",
        description: null,
        status: "low",
        completed: false,
        expires_at: null,
      }),
    },
  },
  data() {
    return {
      formData: { ...this.initialData },
    };
  },
  watch: {
    // Si cambia initialData (por ejemplo al editar), actualiza formData
    initialData: {
      deep: true,
      handler(newVal) {
        this.formData = { ...newVal };
      },
    },
  },
  methods: {
    async onSubmit(values) {
      const taskRepository = new TaskRepositoryImpl();

      const taskData = new Task({
        id: task.value.id,
        description: values.description,
        active: values.active,
      });

      // Attempts to coerce values to the correct type
      let parsedData = taskSchema.cast(taskData, {
        stripUnknown: true,
        assert: true,
      });

      try {
        let taskResponse = null;

        if (task.value.id) {
          // Editar categoría existente
          const updateTaskUseCase = new UpdateTaskUseCase(taskRepository);
          taskResponse = await updateTaskUseCase.execute(parsedData);
          this.$emit("taskUpdated");
        } else {
          // Agregar nueva categoría
          const storeTaskUseCase = new StoreTaskUseCase(taskRepository);
          taskResponse = await storeTaskUseCase.execute(parsedData);
          this.$emit("taskAdded");
        }

        if (!taskResponse?.error) {
          // closeModal();
        }
      } catch (error) {
        console.error("Error al guardar la task", error);
      }
    },
  },
};
</script>
